property.name: Ability
property.value: +2 on any attempt to destroy Nuclear Power Companies.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card immediately after the dice are rolled on any attempt (by any player) to destroy, control, or neutralize. That roll is immediately changed, retroactively, to a 2.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card during your turn to automatically take control of any one uncontrolled group. Playing this card counts as an action.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Treat this group as Government when it attempts to control a Government group.

property.value: +3 on any attempt to destroy any group.

property.value: Play this card at any time to either count the money on any one group card or examine all of one player's special cards.

property.value: +2 on any attempt to destroy any group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card after privilege has been invoked. The privilege is totally abolished. That attack cannot be made privileged.

property.value: When it transfers money, that money can go to any group in the same Power Structure.

property.value: Normal resistance 3; against any Liberal, Communist, or Weird group, resistance 10.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Owning player may tax each opponent 2MB on his own income phase. Tax may come from any group. If a player has no money, he owes no tax.

property.name: Ability
property.value: You may interfere with one privileged attack. No other players may interfere.

property.value: You may interfere with one privileged attack. No other players may interfere.

property.value: +5 on any attempt to control Big Media or Empty Vee.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card during your income phase to double all your groups' incomes, for that turn only. This card does not allow the IRS to collect twice, or require the Post Office to pay twice.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card at any time to revive a group from the dead pile. It becomes uncontrolled. (If the Servants of Cthulhu destroyed the group, it still counts as a destroyed group for victory. If they destroy it again, it counts again!)

property.name: Ability
property.value: +6 on any attempt to destroy any Communist group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card immediately after the dice are rolled on any attempt (by any player) to destroy, control, or neutralize. That roll is immediately changed, retroactively, to a 12.

property.name: Ability
property.value: On his turn, owner can add, remove, or reverse an alignment of any one other group in play; change lasts for that turn only.

property.name: Ability
property.value: +3 on any attempt to control, neutralize, or destroy the Phone Company.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Pay 5 MB from this group to draw an extra card on your turn. This is not an action.

property.value: +5 for direct control of S.F. Fans. +2 for direct control of Trekkies.

property.value: +2 on any attempt to control any Weird group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: You may attempt to destroy a single group with Power 0. Roll attacking power vs. defending resistance, but a successful attack destroys the target. Playing this card is not an action, but the attack itself is an action.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card at any time to reorganize all your money freely - that is, any amount(s) may be moved between any groups. You also get an extra 5MB which may be placed anywhere.
